commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: S-So this is the gathering place of fallen angels--Harajuku!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yoshiko, I don't think fallen angels really gather here, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I'm not Yoshiko! I'm Yohane!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Heyyy! You two over there! You keep looking around and you're gonna get separated from the group!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Come with us.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Hey, look, Rina-chi's getting swept away by the crowd, too. Let's just hold hands.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whoa! Akihabara's got a ton of people, but Harajuku's no slouch. I feel dizzy just looking at everyone!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Wait, aren't you used to crowds, Rin? C'mon, pull it together!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So we're where you and Hanamaru wanted to visit. What do you think?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I-It's not that big a deal. I could make everyone in a crowd this size into little demons easy!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I want crepes and ice cream. Ahh, I want to eat all the tasty things here, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You're always like this, Zuramaru!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I want to check out some new shoes, but there are so many tasty smells everywhere I just can't beat the temptation!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Ah, Riiiin! You're going to lose us!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Sorry, I got pulled over by a great smell!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rin, wanna hold hands?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Sure!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: All right, everyone, make sure you don't stray too far, okay? Because if you lose us once, you'll never see us again.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Wh-What?! Is Harajuku really supposed to be that dangerous?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: How could you drag us to such a place?! Is there a dimensional hole somewhere that leads to the netherworld?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Mmm, yep. See, the dark winds have come just for you, Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Nooo! I've already fallen, so I don't need to go to hell! And remember to call me Yohane!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Nozomi, your comebacks are great, zura. Thanks for humoring Yoshiko, zura.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* Well, you're all my adorable underclassmen.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, how about we get going, then? Zuramaru wants to grab some street food while we walk, so how about you, Yoshiko?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I told you, I'm Yohane!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh. Take me someplace that receives signs from the dark world--that, or a place I can gain new little demons.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: She's saying she wants to go to a popular store with plenty of customers and a big bookstore!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow, Hanamaru, you really know Yoshiko well!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: N-No she doesn't!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm, all right. In that case, how about we keep walking down this street?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Make sure we don't get lost, everyone. Rina-chan Board says, "Let's go!"

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You two seem familiar with the area.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I come here to hang out pretty often. I came here with Rinari a while ago, too, so I can show you around a bit.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We know where to find good crepes and popcorn.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Wow! I'd love to hear where, zura!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hold on, we have to get the signs from the dark world first!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I need to bask in the magical power of Tokyo, the magic metropolis.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I know! If you want to boost your magical power, Yoshiko, I know a good place! There's a really tall tower!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hmph, a fallen angel wouldn't go out of her way to someplace high up. It's obvious that you don't understand the dark power that resides deep in this land!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: And call me Yohane! Come on!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: So, Rin, Yoshiko actually just wants to find out if it's true that you'll get scouted to be a model just from walking around Harajuku.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ohhh, I see.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So you were expecting that kind of surprise, huh?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Z-Zuramaru! Why do you keep saying what you don't need to?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh, those are some tasty-looking crepes!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That place is pretty good, Hanamaru, but there's an even better one.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Now that sounds good, zura! What kind of amazing toppings do Tokyo crepes have?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: W-Wait, you can't just eat it right away. I'm going to use it for my fallen angel broadcast, so wait for me to take a picture first!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* Everyone's having a good time, huh?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: How about you, Nozomi?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I'm having a lot of fun, too. But... Hm. It feels like I can't enjoy this fully, y'know?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, I'm in the same boat. Like, I keep thinking about the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Nozomi, Ai, it'll be totally fine! I just know it'll work out somehow! No, we'll make it work out somehow!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Aw, Rin...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ahaha, you're right. I got kind of pathetic there for a bit!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: We've got school idol groups from three schools, zura. If we've got this many people, we can make the impossible possible, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hmph, no one can hope to stop a fallen angel!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I think so, too. So let's have lots of fun today and fill up on our power. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You're right! Then what say we head over to Rina-chi's favorite crepe joint first?
